text: mariyu a roju satyanni tiraskarincina varini narakagni munduku tecci, varito (ila anabadutundi): "Miru, mi ihaloka jivitanlo mi bhogabhagyalanu tarigincukunnaru mariyu vatini baga anubhavincaru; kavuna miru e hakku lekunda bhumilo pradarsincina ahankaraniki mariyu miru cesina avidheyataku pratiphalanga, i roju miku avamanakaramaina siksa vidhincabadutundi
